title: Design Alchemy print ad
content:
A self-promotional print ad that was run summer 2001 to promote design services.   
   
target market : 20 something urban   
   
 ![Design Alchemy print ad.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417131835im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/903.jpg)
